samples.current_output: Non-transport: 20 years validity (age 50 varai), piragu 5 years. Transport: 3 years. Renewal: Expiry-kku 1 year mun or 1 year pin (late fee applicable). Online: parivahan.gov.in. Expired license-udan drive panninal fine Rs.5,000.

Aama, reasonable cooperation venum. Aanaal rights therinchukonga: 1) Self-incriminating statement kodukka vendaam, 2) Lawyer presence-la statement kodukkalam, 3) Illegal search oppose pannalam, 4) Narco test, brain mapping - consent venum.

Required: 1) Written complaint (5 copies), 2) Bill/Invoice copy, 3) Warranty/Guarantee card, 4) Correspondence with seller (letters, emails), 5) ID proof, 6) Address proof, 7) Photos/Videos of defect. Online filing: edaakhil.nic.in portal ‡ÆÆ‡ØÇ‡Æ≤‡ÆÆ‡Øç.

samples.instruction: GPA (General Power of Attorney) moolam property sale valid-aa?
samples.current_output: Supreme Court ruling (2011): GPA moolam property sale NOT valid. GPA holder sale deed execute pannalam, but final ownership transfer Principal neril vandhu sign seyyanum or properly registered Special Power of Attorney venum.

TN Shops and Establishments Act: 1) 8 hours work/day, 48 hours/week, 2) Weekly off mandatory, 3) Leave: 12 days earned + 12 days sick + 5 casual, 4) Overtime double wages, 5) No child labour (<14 years). Violation: Labour Inspector complaint.

ESI card + ID proof kaattunga. Dispensary-la OP treatment free. Serious cases: ESI hospital referral. Tied-up hospitals-lum treatment available. Emergency-kku any hospital-la treatment petru reimbursement claim pannalam. Dependent family members-kkum cover undu.

Notary Public office (court complex nearby). Cost: Rs.50-200 (stamp paper) + Rs.100-500 (notary fee). Documents: ID proof, matter details. Self-drafted allowed. Notarized affidavit = legal document. e-Stamp paper available at banks.

Appeal options: Lower court reject ‚Üí Sessions Court. Sessions reject ‚Üí High Court. High Court reject ‚Üí Supreme Court. Fresh application: New grounds/changed circumstances irundhaal same court-layae fresh petition podalam. Legal aid available.

samples.instruction: Legal notice eppadi anuppuvadhu? Lawyer venumaa?
samples.current_output: Self anuppalaam, but lawyer recommended for proper drafting. Format: 1) From/To addresses, 2) Subject, 3) Facts, 4) Legal grounds, 5) Demand/relief sought, 6) Time limit (usually 15-30 days), 7) Consequence warning. Send: Registered post AD (Acknowledgement Due). Keep copy + postal receipt. Reply not mandatory but advisable.

samples.instruction: Bank loan EMI katta mudiyala, enna aagum?
samples.current_output: EMI default aanaal: 1) 90 days delay = NPA (Non-Performing Asset), 2) Bank notice anuppum, 3) Recovery agent varalam - aanaal avanga threaten panna koodaadhu, 4) Restructure/one-time settlement kelunga, 5) Home loan: SARFAESI Act-in keezh property auction aagalam. RBI guidelines: Recovery agent harassment-kku complaint podalam.

Offence severity based - Rs.10,000 to lakhs varai. Court discretion. Surety (guarantor) same amount-kku guarantee kodukkanum. Poor accused-kku personal bond (surety illaama) kidaikkum. Excessive bail unconstitutional.

Minimum 5 years continuous service venum. 10+ employees ulla establishment-kku applicable. Death/disability case-la 5 years vendaam. Calculation: Last drawn salary √ó 15/26 √ó years of service. Maximum: Rs.20 lakhs.

Bill ‡Æá‡Æ≤‡Øç‡Æ≤‡Ææ‡Æµ‡Æø‡Æü‡Øç‡Æü‡Ææ‡Æ≤‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Øç complaint ‡Æ™‡Øã‡Æü‡Æ≤‡Ææ‡ÆÆ‡Øç. Alternative proofs: 1) Bank/card statement, 2) Online payment screenshot, 3) Warranty card, 4) Packaging with shop name, 5) Witness statement. ‡ÆÜ‡Æ©‡Ææ‡Æ≤‡Øç bill ‡Æá‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æ®‡Øç‡Æ§‡Ææ‡Æ≤‡Øç case strong ‡ÆÜ‡Æï‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Øç.

Cognizable offence-kku warrant illama arrest pannalam. Non-cognizable-kku warrant venum. Bailable offence-kku arrest thevai illa - notice podhum. 7 years-kku keezh punishment offences-kku generally arrest avoid pannanum (Supreme Court guidelines).

samples.instruction: Online-la fraud aayitten, police-kku ponaa ozhungaa case poduvaangalaa? (Chennai style)
samples.current_output: Cyber crime special cell irukku - trained officers. cybercrime.gov.in-la first complaint podunga - track aagum. Local police-kkum FIR podunga. Both simultaneously pannalam. Evidence (screenshots, bank statements) ready-aa vachukonga.

Hindu Succession Act ‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø: Class I heirs (wife, sons, daughters, mother) ‡Æö‡ÆÆ‡ÆÆ‡Ææ‡Æï ‡Æ™‡Æô‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ ‡Æ™‡ØÜ‡Æ±‡ØÅ‡Æµ‡Ææ‡Æ∞‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ≥‡Øç. Class I ‡Æá‡Æ≤‡Øç‡Æ≤‡Ææ‡Æµ‡Æø‡Æü‡Øç‡Æü‡Ææ‡Æ≤‡Øç Class II (father, siblings, etc.). Muslim-‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ Shariat law, Christian-‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ Indian Succession Act apply.

Claim amount based: 1) Rs.1 crore varai - District Consumer Forum, 2) Rs.1-10 crore - State Commission, 3) Rs.10 crore mela - National Commission. Online: consumerhelpline.gov.in or NCH app moolam. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

samples.instruction: Traffic police license vaangittu poyittaar, enna panradhu? (Chennai style)
samples.current_output: Challan receipt vaangunga - license-kku padhil temporary receipt koduppaanga. Fine pay panni license collect pannunga (traffic police station/court). 60 days-kkul collect pannalnna cancelled aagalam. Online payment-um available.

Direct-aa poda mudiyaadhu. Aanaal government-kitta private company pattrina information ketkalam (permits, licenses, contracts, subsidies). Example: Builder RERA compliance pattri RERA Authority-kitta RTI podalam.

RTE Act 25%: EWS/disadvantaged group-‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ reserved. Apply: Online portal (rte.tn.gov.in). Rejection complaint: Block Education Officer, DEO, State RTE Authority. Documents: Income certificate, caste certificate, residence proof. Age: 6-14 years.

samples.instruction: Medicine MRP-kku mela vitraal complaint enge?
samples.current_output: Complaint: Drug Inspector (District), State Drug Control. Legal Metrology Department-um complaint edukkum. Pharmacy license suspend/cancel aagalam. Consumer forum-la compensation. Evidence: Bill with MRP comparison. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

Corporation/Municipality complaint: Solid Waste Management Rules violation. Police: IPC 268 (public nuisance), 269 (negligent act spreading disease). Photos/videos evidence. Tahsildar complaint-‡Æâ‡ÆÆ‡Øç possible. Fine up to Rs.5,000 for waste dumping violation.

Maintenance and Welfare of Parents Act 2007: Children (including married daughters) parents-‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ maintain ‡Æö‡ØÜ‡ÆØ‡Øç‡ÆØ‡Æ£‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Øç. Tribunal: SDM/Tahsildar level. Maintenance order: Rs.10,000/month max. Property revocation: Gift deed cancel possible if neglect proved.

Registered chit: Registrar of Chits (District). Unregistered: Police (cheating), Economic Offences Wing. TN Chit Funds Act violation. Consumer forum-‡Æâ‡ÆÆ‡Øç possible. Documents: Chit tickets, receipts, agreement. Collective complaint stronger.

Full refund with interest-‡Æâ‡ÆÆ‡Øç ‡Æï‡Øá‡Æü‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ≤‡Ææ‡ÆÆ‡Øç. Consumer forum-‡Æ≤‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Øç parallel-‡ÆÜ case ‡Æ™‡Øã‡Æü‡Æ≤‡Ææ‡ÆÆ‡Øç.
